subject: Eyes and Eyesight
Television
Athletics and Sports
Baseball
lead_paragraph: In the worst incident, the mediocre Fox duo of Thom Brennaman and Steve Lyons mocked a nearly-blind Mets fan’s glasses for an agonizing 53 seconds.
snippet: In the worst incident, the mediocre Fox duo of Thom Brennaman and Steve Lyons mocked a nearly-blind Mets fan’s glasses for an agonizing 53 seconds.
